'''Dr. Chesney''' is a doctor who was an expert in the use of bovine valves instead of porcine valves.

==History==
===Consulting on Devo Friedman===
Because Burke had never transplanted a bovine mitral valve before, he set up a video conference with Dr. Chesney to get his assistance.

==Career==
He is a cardiothoracic surgeon who was an expert in the use of bovine valves instead of porcine valves. He assisted Dr. Burke the first time he performed the procedure.
